mapper.select: select count(1) from ACC_LOAN a,lst_iqp_info t where a.cert_code = #{certCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} and a.account_status in ('4', '5', '0', '1') and t.list_serno = a.list_serno and t.cover_create_status = '04' and substr(t.prd_id,5,2) = '02'

select count(1) from lst_iqp_info t, acc_loan a where t.list_serno = a.list_serno and a.cert_code = #{certCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} and t.prd_id = '05210306' and t.cover_create_status = '04' and a.account_status in ('4', '5', '0', '1')

select sum(a.loan_balance) as loanBalance from lst_iqp_info t, acc_loan a where t.list_serno = a.list_serno and t.cover_create_status = '04' and a.cert_code = #{certCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.account_status in ('4', '5', '0', '1') and t.prd_id = '05210306'
select count(1) from ACC_LOAN a where a.iqp_loan_serno=#{serno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update ACC_LOAN set EFFECT_STATUS = '3',ACCOUNT_STATUS = '3' where BILL_NO = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from acc_loan a where a.iqp_loan_serno = #{serno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

BIZ_TYPE_DETAIL, DEV_AMT, DEV_AMT_PRE, DEV_FLAG, IR_TYPE, SPRD_RATE, FREQUENCY, PAY_DISTANCE, DUE_DAY, IR_ADJUST_MODE, PAY_TYPE, FINE_INT, COMD_INT, TERM, TERM_EXT, PRJ_COP_NO, NEW_ACCOUNT_CLASS, LOAN_TYPE_NO, LOAN_TYPE_NAME, OGR_TERM, INTEREST_ACC_MODE, CANCEL_SUM, CANCEL_INTEREST, CLA_NOW, CLA_NOW_DATE, LIST_SERNO, IQP_LOAN_SERNO, PARTNER_NO, CHANNEL_NO, CERT_TYPE, CERT_CODE, DIRECTION_NAME, LOAN_USE_TYPE, USE_DEC, INPUT_ID, INPUT_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, EFFECT_STATUS, PARTNER_NAME, CHANNEL_NAME, RE_EXPLORE_DATE, REPAYMENT_MODE_DESC, REPAY_PERCENT, CLAIM_SETTLING_FREQUENCY, CURRENT_CLAIM_TERM, TREATY_PK, PREVENT_RATE, PAY_ACCOUNT, PAY_ACCOUNT_NAME, INTEREST_SUBSIDY, OVER_TIMES_DAYS, OVERDUE_INT, OVERDUE_FINE_INT, CHECK_DATE, DATA_SOURCE, EFFECT_DATE, PAID_AMT_TOTAL, RECOVERED_AMT_TOTAL, PAID_AMT_SUM, OVERDUE_START_DATE, PRE_ACCOUNT_STATUS, NET_PHONE, PRD_INSTANCE, LST_FOREIGN_KEY, LST_INNET_KEY, RISK_GRADE, SXYH_PREPAY_FLAG, SECOND_ACCOUNTS
from ACC_LOAN where BILL_NO = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t.cover_amount as coverAmount,t.Excuse_Rate as excuseRate from lst_iqp_info t,acc_loan a where t.list_serno = a.list_serno and a.bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
